theorem smooth_smul {G} [NormedAddCommGroup G] [NormedSpace (exprâ„) G] {g : M â†’ G}

    _ âŠ† tsupport f := (tsupport_smul_subset_left _ _)
    _ âŠ† (chart_at _ c).source := f.tsupport_subset_chart_at_source
    
  exact f.smooth_at.smul ((hg _ this).cont_mdiff_at <| IsOpen.mem_nhds (chart_at _ _).open_source this)
